TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAttributeAccessor

summary.span: 定义由 ASP.NET 服务器控件用来对服务器控件的开始标记中声明的任何特性提供编程访问的方法。

span.span: Defines methods used by ASP.NET server controls to provide programmatic access to any attribute declared in the opening tag of a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你编写继承自的自定义服务器控件， ，或类，.NET Framework 自动提供以编程方式访问属性因为其中每个类实现接口。If you author a custom server control that inherits from the , , or class, the .NET Framework automatically provides programmatic access to attributes because each of these classes implement the interface. 如果你编写的自定义服务器控件的不继承自这些类之一，计划允许以编程方式访问控件的强类型属性不对应的属性，请务必实现接口。If you author a custom server control that does not inherit from one of these classes and plan to allow programmatic access to attributes that do not correspond with the control's strongly typed properties, be sure to implement the interface. ## Examples [!code-csharp[IAttributeAccessor_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IAttributeAccessor_Sample/CS/iattributeaccessor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IAttributeAccessor_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IAttributeAccessor_Sample/VB/iattributeaccessor.vb#1)]

param.name: key
param.span: 一个 对象，表示服务器控件特性的名称。

span.span: A that represents the name of the server control attribute.

summary.span: 当由某个类实现时，检索服务器控件中指定的特性属性。

span.span: When implemented by a class, retrieves the specified attribute property from the server control.
The value of the specified attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method. span.span: The name of the attribute to be set.
The value assigned to the attribute.

summary.span: 当由类实现时，指定要分配给 ASP.NET 服务器控件的特性及其值。

span.span: When implemented by a class, designates an attribute and its value to assign to the ASP.NET server control.
